decks.notes: This deck focuses on disrupting opponent's strategy with disruptive creatures like Thalia and Phyrexian Revoker while applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Mirran Crusader and Palace Jailer. The deck utilizes equipment such as Batterskull and Sword of Fire and Ice to further increase the board presence and generate card advantage. With cards like Mother of Runes and Flickerwisp for protection and disruption, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and disrupt opponent's game plan while applying pressure to close out the game quickly.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively with low-cost creatures like Death's Shadow and Delver of Secrets while utilizing spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to disrupt your opponent's game plan. The deck also incorporates ways to manipulate your life total, such as Street Wraith and Reanimate, to further strengthen Death's Shadow. The mana base is centered around efficient dual lands and Wasteland to ensure consistent casting of the deck's spells. Stubborn Denial provides additional protection for your key creatures, making it difficult for opponents to deal with your threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing disruptive creatures and equipment to control the board and disrupt opponents' strategies, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures. It aims to disrupt opponents' game plan by locking down or taxing their resources, while also utilizing equipment to quickly close out games. The deck includes cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Phyrexian Revoker to slow down opponents, along with creatures like Flickerwisp and Serra Avenger to apply pressure. It also includes powerful equipment like Batterskull and Sword of Fire and Ice to boost creatures and provide additional threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent with their powerful abilities and high stats. By utilizing cards like Eldrazi Mimic, Thought-Knot Seer, and Reality Smasher, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland help to control the board and limit the opponent's options, while cards like Umezawa's Jitte provide additional utility and removal. Overall, the deck seeks to establish a dominant board presence and close out the game swiftly through aggressive plays.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on playing powerful Eldrazi creatures quickly and disrupting the opponent with Chalice of the Void. The deck utilizes acceleration with mana-producing lands like Ancient Tomb and Eldrazi Temple, while also providing disruption with Wasteland and Chalice of the Void. By playing efficient threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and quickly close out the game. The inclusion of cards like Endless One and Walking Ballista provide additional versatility and reach in different board states.

The main concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Combo - Reanimator deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Ashen Rider using cards like Faithless Looting and Entomb, and then bring them back onto the battlefield with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. This allows the player to cheat out powerful threats ahead of schedule and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to respond. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on playing efficient threats early on to put pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Daze. Using powerful creatures like Gurmag Angler and True-Name Nemesis, along with versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Force of Will, the deck aims to close out the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to all three colors of mana, allowing for optimal utilization of the deck's spells and creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively play powerful creatures like Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler while disrupting your opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Daze. Delver of Secrets provides early pressure, while Reanimate can bring back key threats from the graveyard. The deck also includes a suite of efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to control the board. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes cards like Brainstorm and Ponder to smooth out draws. Overall, this deck aims to apply pressure quickly while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing low cost, efficient creatures combined with disruptive spells to maintain control of the game while applying consistent pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Nimble Mongoose, and Tarmogoyf alongside counter spells like Daze, Spell Pierce, and Force of Will, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total while preventing them from executing their game plan. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive strategy while also providing access to multiple colors for spell casting flexibility.

The deck focuses on playing aggressively with low-cost, high-power creatures like Death's Shadow and Delver of Secrets while disrupting the opponent with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will. It also utilizes spells like Reanimate and Daze to maintain tempo advantage. The deck aims to quickly reduce its own life total to make Death's Shadow a potent threat, all while controlling the board and pressuring the opponent to make efficient plays. The mana base is streamlined to support the deck's fast-paced game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to use creatures with the Infect ability, such as Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf, along with pump spells like Invigorate and Berserk to quickly deal 10 poison counters to the opponent. The deck also includes mana ramp in the form of Noble Hierarch and cantrips like Ponder and Brainstorm to help dig for combo pieces. Disruption spells like Daze, Force of Will, and Spell Pierce help protect the combo, while Vines of Vastwood provides protection against removal. Overall, the deck focuses on fast and efficient combos to win the game.

The deck focuses on aggressively lowering your own life total to pump up your Death's Shadow while disrupting your opponent's game plan with hand disruption and counterspells. Delver of Secrets and Gurmag Angler provide additional threats to pressure your opponent. The deck aims to control the game through tempo plays and efficient removal spells while utilizing the power of Death's Shadow as a game-ending threat. By efficiently managing your life total and resources, you can quickly overwhelm your opponent and secure a victory through a combination of aggression and disruption.

The main concept of this UWx Control deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful control spells such as Swords to Plowshares, Force of Will, and Counterspell, while also generating card advantage with cards like Snapcaster Mage and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan before eventually closing out the game with powerful threats like Monastery Mentor and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. This deck excels at outmaneuvering opponents and grinding out victories through a combination of powerful control elements and card advantage.

The main idea behind this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal, and powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by playing cards like Rest in Peace, Energy Field, and Back to Basics. The deck also includes win conditions such as Helm of Obedience to mill the opponent's library and cards like Detention Sphere and Supreme Verdict for board control. Overall, the deck is focused on maintaining control of the game until it can secure a win.

The main idea of this deck is to control the board by using powerful control spells like Force of Will, Counterspell, and Swords to Plowshares to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck focuses on card advantage through effects like Brainstorm and Snapcaster Mage, and utilizes Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Monastery Mentor to generate additional value. The deck also includes cards like Terminus, Council's Judgment, and Search for Azcanta to deal with threats and manipulate the top of the library. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through incremental advantage.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay and utilizing Death's Shadow as a powerful threat. It includes efficient spells like Ponder, Preordain, and Brainstorm to set up the ideal board state. The deck also contains disruption and control elements with cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's strategies, with Wasteland providing disruption and fetchlands to ensure color consistency. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt opponent's strategies to secure victory.
